channel.title: White risk on screen of menu and game
channel.description:
After I installed and opened the game, in menu and in game itself, this white line that cuts the diagonal of the screen and also 2 lines on the right side and down on the screen never get out.
I tried reinstalling the Black Mesa and nothing has changed, does anyone know what this might be and how to fix?
PS: I thought it was vertical sync and was not ... ![2013-12-16_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://5hyiOeJALeDzQHArRXGUCOdp7Dg.jpeg)

item.title: White risk on screen of menu and game
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Answer to revived thread.

Uncheck “Enable HUD post process”

Read full topic
item.source: White risk on screen of menu and game

item.title: White risk on screen of menu and game
item.dc:creator: Gordon_Tiecollaronde
item.description:
Appears to be what I call “The Diagonal Line of Doom”. I first saw it on some homebrew-games and emulator handheld that I can’t seem to remember the name of. It was because of the game going too friggin’ fast for the handheld to handle. Considering this is the mainly slow and boring part of the game, that can’t be the issue. Wonder what it is.

Read full topic
item.source: White risk on screen of menu and game

item.title: White risk on screen of menu and game
item.dc:creator: zezegui222
item.description:
Maxey:

Try verifying the Source SDK Base files and updating your videocard drivers.

Ah e da próxima vez escreve linha em vez de risco.

É, eu fiquei em dúvida mesmo no que escrever, risco ou linha, e acabei deixando como risco.

Vou fazer o que você aconselhou.

Edit: Bom, eu antes havia entrado no SDK Base e ele estava normal, diferente do Black Mesa, mas vou verificar aqui.

####################################################

Edit²: Nothing worked until now, continues with lines cutting the game screen.

####################################################

Read full topic
item.source: White risk on screen of menu and game
